furrow.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a deep line or fold in the skin of someone’s face, especially on the forehead
furrow.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: A deep furrow appeared between his brows.
furrow.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a wide deep line made in the surface of something, especially the ground
furrow.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: the regular furrows of a plowed field
The river cuts a long straight furrow between the hills.
furrow.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to make the skin on your face form deep lines or folds, especially because you are worried or thinking hard
furrow.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to make a wide deep line in the surface of something
